CONTEXT CLOCK - READY TO RUN DISTRIBUTION
==========================================

üì¶ WHAT'S INCLUDED:
-------------------
‚úÖ ContextClock.exe - The main application (57MB)
‚úÖ config.yaml     - Configuration file with example settings

üöÄ HOW TO RUN:
--------------
1. Double-click ContextClock.exe to start the application
2. The app will run in your system tray (bottom-right corner)
3. Right-click the tray icon to access the menu

‚öôÔ∏è CUSTOMIZATION:
-----------------
1. Edit config.yaml to customize your time blocks and actions
2. Right-click the tray icon ‚Üí "Reload Configuration" to apply changes
3. No need to restart the application!

üìù CONFIGURATION TIPS:
----------------------
- Use full file paths (e.g., C:\Users\YourName\Pictures\wallpaper.jpg)
- Make sure wallpaper images and music files exist
- Check application paths are correct before adding them
- Use 24-hour time format (e.g., "14:30" for 2:30 PM)

üîß SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
-----------------------
- Windows 10/11
- No additional software installation required
- All dependencies are built into the executable

üìã EXAMPLE TIME BLOCKS:
-----------------------
morning   (06:00-12:00) - Start your day with productivity tools
afternoon (12:00-18:00) - Focus mode with work applications  
evening   (18:00-22:00) - Relaxation with entertainment apps
night     (22:00-06:00) - Wind down with calming content

üí° TROUBLESHOOTING:
-------------------
- If tray icon doesn't appear: Check Windows notification area settings
- If files don't work: Verify all file paths in config.yaml exist
- For help: Check the logs folder (created automatically)

üéâ ENJOY YOUR AUTOMATED DIGITAL ENVIRONMENT!
